name: Mikey's Basics: The Abandoned School
description:
Man, you KNOW every mod for Baldi's Basics got some horror mod, and here's the one for Mikey's Basics.

This mod is even scary, so if you pee yourself while playing then you need to play more horror games, anyway uhh here is story:

Sorry you miss Mikey when you escaped for his home much year ago so you sad so you decided to pay him a visit. But uhhh when you saw the house you have a lot of regret

So Mikeys house got turned into some laboratory for experiments on people agenist their own will. And unfortunately Mikey got experiment, and this is were i'm gonna stop writing because my brain is farted. So get dem books but they got broken so they're BROKEN NOTEBOOKS WOWOOWOOOWOOOWOWOOWOWO

Anyways, no more cringe writing play the game now.

I ALMOST FORGOR mod I stole to make this btw: Baldi's Basics The Old Laboratory of Failure Experiments 1.4.3 by D45YT (itch.io)
